comments.body: This no longer allows elements. Was this wrong before?

Yes, according to my tests, assigning elements doesnt work:

https://codesandbox.io/s/react-big-calendar-example-sygd2?file=/index.js

(But I did not check the source...)

Implementation access elements from components like this: ```typescript const { event: Event, date: AgendaDate } = components // ... ``` ```jsx {Event ? : title} ``` And the demos in `examples/demos` that are specifying a `components` prop are only using functional components.
